ready: Hello there! I'm an offline music assistant powered by Snips Flow.

selfIntroduction: I am an offline music assistant made by Snips. I can understand more than ten thousand music, artist and album names. You can ask me queries just like how you ask your friend, such as 'play some Michael Jackson', 'put some jazz music' or 'I want listen some music' etc.
